home.title: L'ouverture approche
home.line-2: The show is about to begin!
home.line-3: When it does, minting will open!
home.line-4: What role will you play in Neo Kabuki?

about.title: About
about.line-1: Neo Kabuki is an homage to the 400 year old art form of Kabuki from Japan’s Edo Period.
about.line-2: We love the art and respectfully break from tradition in pursuit of a fresh modern approach to the art form, thus Neo Kabuki.
about.line-3: The Journey starts with our heroes, heroines, samurai, geisha, and/or spirits.  Whom do you relate to? Who expresses how you feel?  What role will you play in our universe?

1.ques: How can I buy a Kabuki?
1.ans: When the Theater opens, you will be able to Mint from the website!

3.ques: Do I own the rights to this Kabuki after purchasing?
3.ans: Yes, full intellectual properties of the individual Kabuki are given to the buyer.
